item.title: MLOps - Industrialize your computer vision models using Docker and REST API
item.description: The goal is to deploy a Docker image featuring a REST API built with FastAPI in order to exploit a computer vision model responsible for classifying input photographs into one of seven forms of skin cancer.

item.title: How to Train a Custom Vision Transformer (ViT) Image Classifier to Help Endoscopists in Less than 5 min
item.description: The goal is to create a fast, flexible and user-friendly toolkit that can be used to easily develop state-of-the-art computer vision technologies, including systems for Image Classification, Semantic Segmentation, Object Detection, Image Generation, Denoising and much more.
